scripts.start:app: concurrently -k -n "backend,frontend" -c "cyan,green" "npm run start --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.prisma:deploy: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev --name init && cd ..
scripts.prisma:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed & cd ..
scripts.dev: npm run start:db && sleep 5 && npm run prisma:deploy && npm run prisma:seed && npm run start:app
